meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bruce Katz Christina Wilber David Bowen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2630.

td.p: Bruce Katz, a writer from Silver Spring, Maryland
Christina Wilber, a bartender from South Seaside Park, New Jersey
David Bowen, a scientist originally from London, England (whose 1-day cash winnings total $7,300)

tr.td: MAMMALS
NURSERY RHYMES
COLORS
MOUNTAINS
FAMOUS FIRSTS
3–LETTER WORDS

Christina
Bruce
2-day champion: $22,700
3rd place: Astral crystal set + Jeopardy! home game

David
Christina
Bruce

(including 2 DDs),
